title: [文宣] 有新video share上facebook 如果有facebook page想要可以telegram我

replies.msg:
如果有facebook page想要可以telegram我 http://t.me/ugnyte
All footage doesn't belong to me, I only responsible for photo and video editing. If you want to remove any footage please feel free to contact me. Feel free to share, don't need to credit me but please credit the following list
